DOLOMITE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”90%” max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”63px||7px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Dolomite.jpg” title_text=”Dolomite” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”center” align_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|50|50|100|4|0|0″ global_colors_info=”{}” filter_hue_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” filter_hue_rotate__hover=”31deg”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.6em” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

DOLOMITE is a carbonate mineral formed of anhydrous carbonate, CaMg(CO3)2 is an anhydrous carbonate mineral. The term is also used for sedimentary carbonate rock, mainly made up of the dolomite mineral. Dolostone is an alternate name used occasionally for the form of dolomite rock.

Dolomite is used in agriculture as a soil conditioner and feed supplement for livestock. The main reasons behind the Dolomite Powder popularity we have are of high level of whiteness and purity. In accordance with the time and in individual quantities, we assure our customers of the delivery of dolomite powder. We are the producer, dealer and exporter of Dolomite powders in India.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004b4f” text_font_size=”18px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_6_font=”Lato|700||on|||||” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”25px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Physical Properties
  • Less reactive
  • Better acid resistance
  • Increases flow rates because of its higher Bulk Density and Sp. Gravity
  • Higher Production rate

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”18px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|||||||” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”25px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

APPLICATION
  • Powder (100-700 Mesh & Up to 2 Micron)
  • Sheet / Float Glass Industries
  • Glassware Industries
  • Picture Tube Industries
  • Ceramic Floor & Wall Tile Industries
  • Sanitary ware Industries
  • Insulator Industries
  • Ceramic Frit Industries
  • Stoneware / Art ware / Tableware Manufacturers
  • Cement Industries
  • Paint Industries
  • Rubber Industries
  • Sponge Iron Industries
  • Pipe Coating Industries
  • Foundries
  • Detergent Applications

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700||on|||||” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”25px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”||-9px|||” custom_padding=”10px||25px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Specification of Dolomite

Please work with your salesperson for help in selecting the right product(s).

Dolomite powder grades in 300 Mesh to 700 Mesh and BSS are available in micronized grades. Our grades in 5, 10, 15- and 20-Micron grades are available

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”90%” max_width=”90%” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|||||||” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”25px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dolomite

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Specification.pdf” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”+ Download PDF” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”15px” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#004b4f” button_font=”Lato|||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”90%” max_width=”95%” custom_padding=”6px||109px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”15px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font=”Lato||||||||” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”25px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”-2px|||||” custom_padding=”13px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” link_text_color__hover=”#e02b20″]
